column4: Scoot over Microsoft: Apple again the most valuable U.S. company
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Apple won back its crown as the most valuable publicly listed U.S. company on Wednesday  ending the session with a market capitalization above recent leaders Microsoft and Amazon.com.

column4: TomTom sees licensing sales growth from Microsoft deal
column5: AMSTERDAM TomTom expects significant growth in its enterprise  or software  sales in 2019  the company said in an email on Wednesday  following publication of its fourth-quarter results.

column4: UPDATE 3-Tesla cuts Model 3 price for second time this year
column5: Feb 6 Tesla Inc said on Wednesday it was lowering the price of its Model 3 sedan for the second time this year  moves that come in the wake of Tesla losing a tax credit that made its cars more affordable for U.S. buyers.

column4: Tesla cuts Model 3 price for second time this year
column5: Feb 5 Electric carmaker Tesla Inc is lowering the price of its Model 3 by $1 100  citing the end of a costly customer referral program  a company spokeswoman said on Wednesday.
